title: Khan Academy — Algebra
description: Free lessons and practice for algebra with videos and quizzes.

title: Paul's Online Math Notes
description: Clear notes and examples for algebra, calculus, and more.

title: Physics Classroom
description: Physics tutorials, concept builders, and practice questions.

title: Crash Course — Science
description: Short, high-quality videos across science topics.

title: Coursera — Study Skills
description: Courses on learning strategies, time management, and productivity.

title: Pomofocus (Pomodoro Timer)
description: Simple Pomodoro timer to improve focus while studying.

title: Notion Student Templates
description: Templates for planners, task lists, and study dashboards.

title: Grammarly Writing Tips
description: Grammar and writing tips for essays and reports.

title: Purdue OWL — Writing Lab
description: Essay structure, citations (APA/MLA), and academic writing help.

title: Wikipedia — World History Portal
description: Good starting point to explore history topics and timelines.

title: National Geographic Education
description: Articles and learning materials for geography and history.

title: MIT OpenCourseWare
description: Free university-level courses and materials across subjects.
